st: Tum Daga Karo Tab Bhi Gaddar Nahi,
s:
Tum Daga Karo Tab Bhi Gaddar Nahi,
Hum Wafa Karein To Bhi Gunahgar Hain,

Khata Teri Nahi O Sanam Mere,
Yeh To Waqt Waqt Ki Maar Hai….

st: Phir Kab Milenge Yeh Unhone Pucha Nahi
s:
Phir Kab Milenge Yeh Unhone Pucha Nahi
Kyu Ho Rahe Hain Juda Yeh Humne Bataya Nahi
Kab Unke Aansuo Ne Humko Bewafa Kaha Pata Hi Nahi
Bus Woh Waqt Hi Kuch Aisa Tha Jisko Humne Pehchana Nahi…

st: Jaanu Main Uski Har Ek Baat
s:
Jaanu Main Uski Har Ek Baat
Aaj Bhi Yaad Aati Hai Wo Pehli Mulaqat
Gujre Wo Lamhe Wo Din Aur Raat
Yahi To Hai Waqt Ki Mujh Ko Saugaat

st: Jo Mila Waqt To Bulaunga Use
s:
Jo Mila Waqt To Bulaunga Use
Us Ke Diye Zakhm Bhi Dikhaunga Use
Us Ki Ye Tamanna Bhi Puri Karunga Ek Roz
Jab Niklegi Aakhri Saans Bhool Jayunga Use…

st: Hum Saath The Ek Raasta Nazar Aata Tha
s:
Hum Saath The Ek Raasta Nazar Aata Tha
Akasar Koi Saathi Paas Aake Haath Badhata Tha
Bewajah Hi Hansi Ka Fuwaara Sa Nikal Jaata Tha
Waqt Kya Hota Kisi Ko Samajh Na Aata Tha

Hum Saath The Dil Aksar Machal Jaata Tha
Bekaarari Karti Thi Ghaayal Awara Ban Jata Tha
Raat Bhar Uske Khayalon Mei Bitata Tha
Saamne Aati Thi Jab Kabhi To Nazrein Churata Tha

Yuhin Har Pal Gujar Aata Jata Tha
Naye Naye Armano Ko Jaga Jata Tha

st: Har Waqt Ranj-O-Malaal Kya, Jo Gujar Gaya So Gujar Gaya
s:
Har Waqt Ranj-O-Malaal Kya, Jo Gujar Gaya So Gujar Gaya
Use Yaad Karke Na Dil Dukha, Jo Gujar Gaya So Gujar Gaya

Na Gila Kiya, Na Khafa Huye, Yoon Hi Raaste Mein Khuda Huye
Na Tu Bewafa Na Main Bewafa, Jo Gujar Gaya So Gujar Gaya

Voh Ghazal Ki Ek Keetab Tha, Voh Gullon Mein Ek Gulab Tha
Zara Der Ka Koi Khwab Tha, Jo Gujar Gaya So Gujar Gaya

Mujhe Patjhadon Ki Kahaniyan Na Suna-Suna Ke Udas Kar
Tu Khizaan Ka Phool Hai Muskura, Jo Gujar Gaya So Gujar Gaya

Ye Safar Bhi Kitna Taveel (Lamba) Hai Yahan Waqat Kitna Kaleel Hai
Kahan Laut Kar Koi Aayega Jo Gujar Gaya So Gujar Gaya

Voh Wafayein Thi Ke Jafayein Thi, N Ye Soch Kiski Khatayein Thi
Voh Tera Hai Usko Gale Laga Jo Gujar Gaya So Gujar Gaya

Tujhe Aitbar-O-Yakeen Nahi, Nahi Duniya Itni Buri Nahi
N Malaal Kar Mere Saath Aa Jo Gujar Gaya So Gujar Gaya

st: khwab tha ya khayal tha kya tha
s:
khwab tha ya khayal tha kya tha
hijr tha ya visal tha kya tha
chamaki bijli si par na samajhe hum
husn tha ya jamal tha kya tha
jis ko hum roz-e-hijr samajhe the
mah tha wo ke saal tha kya tha
‘mussafi’ kal jo chup sa baitha tha
kya tujhe kuch malal tha kya tha

st: Tumhen bhool jaun ye hota nahi
s:
Tumhen bhool jaun ye hota nahi
koi waqt ho dard sota nahi
na ho jao badnam tum is liye
main ro ro ke daman bhigota nahi
ye wo fasl hai jo uge khud-ba-khud
koi dard ke bij bota nahi
ye mana ke tufan ka zor hai
main ghabara ke kashti dubota nahi

st: Tumane suli pe latake jise dekha hoga waqt aayega wohi shakhs masiha hoga khwab dekha ya ki sahara mein basera hoga kya khabar thi ki yahi khwab to saya hoga main fizaon mein bikhar jaunga khushbu ban kar rang hoga na badan hoga na chehara hoga
s: Tumane suli pe latake jise dekha hoga waqt aayega wohi shakhs masiha hoga khwab dekha ya ki sahara mein basera hoga kya khabar thi ki yahi khwab to saya hoga main fizaon mein bikhar jaunga khushbu ban kar rang hoga na badan hoga na chehara hoga

st: Sochate aur jagate sanson ka ik dariya hun main
s:
Sochate aur jagate sanson ka ik dariya hun main
apne gumgashta kinaron ke liye bahata hun main
jal gaya sara badan in mausamon ke aag mein
ek mausam ruh ka hai jis mein ab zinda hun main
mere honton ka tabassum de gaya dhokha tujhe
tune mujhko bag jana dekh le sehra hun main
dekhiye meri pazirai ko ab aata hai kon
lamha bhar ko waqt ke dahaliz par aaya hun main

st: Shabab aaya kisi but par fida hone ka waqt aaya
s:
Shabab aaya kisi but par fida hone ka waqt aaya
meri duniya mein bande ke khuda hone ka waqt aaya
unhen dekha to zahid ne kaha iman ke ye hai
ki ab insan ko sajada-rava hone ka waqt aaya
takallum ke khamoshi kah rahi hai harf-e-matalab se
ki ashk-amez nazron se ada hone ka waqt aaya
khuda jane ye hai auj-e-yaqin ya pasti-e-himmat
khuda se kah raha hun nakhuda hone ka waqt aaya
hamen bhi aa pada hai doston se kam kuch yani
hamare doston ke bevafa hone ka waqt aaya

st: Sham ke sanvale chehare ko nikhara jaye
s:
Sham ke sanvale chehare ko nikhara jaye
kyon na sagar se koi chand ubhara jaye
ras aaya nahi taskin ka sahil koi
phir mujhe pyas ke dariya mein utara jaye
meharaban teri nazar, teri adayen qatil
tujh ko kis naam se ae dost pukara jaye
mujhko dar hai tere wade pe bharosa karake
muft mein ye dil-e-khushafaham na mara jaye
jisake dam se tere din-rat darakhshan the “qateel”
kaise ab us ke bina waqt guzra jaye

st: khwab ke tarah se hai yaad ke tum aaye the
s:
khwab ke tarah se hai yaad ke tum aaye the
jis tarah daman-e-mashriq mein sahar hoti hai
zarre zarre ko tajalli ke khabar hoti hai
aur jab nur ka sailab guzar jata hai
raat bhar ek andhere mein basar hoti hai
kuch isi tarah se hai yaad ke tum aaye the
jaise gulashan mein dabe paon bahar aati hai
patti patti ke liye leke nikhar aati hai
aur phir waqt wo aata hai ke har mauj-e-saba
apne daman mein liye gard-o-gubar aati hai
kuch isi tarah se hai yaad ke tum aaye the
jis tarah mahv-e-safar ho koi virane mein
aur raste mein kaheen koi khiyaban aa jaye
chand lamhon mein khiyaban ke guzar jane par
samane phir vohi duniya-e-biyaban aa jaye
kuch isi tarah se hai yaad ke tum aaye the

st: mil bhi jate hain to katara ke nikal jate hain
s:
mil bhi jate hain to katara ke nikal jate hain
haye mausam ke tarah dost badal jate hain
hum abhi tak hain giraftar-e-muhabbat yaro
thokaren kha ke suna tha ki sambhal jate hain
ye kabhi apni jafa par na hua sharminda
hum samajhate rahe pathar bhi pighal jate hain
umr bhar jin ke vafaon pe bharosa kije
waqt padane pe wohi log badal jate hain

st: Dekho suraj se luka-chipi koi khel raha hai,
s:
Dekho suraj se luka-chipi koi khel raha hai,
Sard mausam hua, dhund ka baadal jhoom raha hai,
Dhoop ab ho jaayegi sabko bohot pyari,
Dekho har ek usi dhoop ko dhoond raha hai !

st: sard mausam ka mazaaj kitna alag sa hay
s:
sard mausam ka mazaaj kitna alag sa hay
taveel raat main intazaar kitna alag sa hay
dhund bani naqab, aur chupa lia sitaron ko
Bink unke tanhaai ka ab ihsas kitna alag sa hay

st: Khaa key gujiya, pee key bhaang,
s:
Khaa key gujiya, pee key bhaang,
laaga k thora thora sa rang,
baaja ke dholak aur mridang,
khele holi hum tere sang.

st: Rango mein ghuli ladki kya laal gulabi hai
s:
Rango mein ghuli ladki kya laal gulabi hai
Jo dekhta hai kehta hai kya maal gulabi hai

Pichle baras tune jo bhigoya tha holi mein
Ab tak nishani ka woh rumaal gulabi hai.

Subah ho yaa shaam ho,
Din ho yaa raat ho,
Jaane kaise bhi halaat hoN..
Hum nahi bhoolenge aapse kehna..
Aaj hai Jamshedi Navroz..
Dua hai yeh ki ye din aapka khaas ho..
